‚öôÔ∏è **CHOCAR** is a Spanish verb with several uses depending on context.

üîπ **1. CHOCAR = To crash / To collide (vehicles, objects)**

**Usage:** Physical collision between two objects or vehicles

‚û°Ô∏è *El coche choc√≥ contra un √°rbol.* (The car crashed into a tree.)

üîπ **2. CHOCAR = To shock / To surprise negatively**
